Overview

This directory has the include files for the Resource Management Layer (RML).

Files

rml_base.h

Interfaces shared by TBB and OpenMP.

rml_omp.h

Interface exclusive to OpenMP.

rml_tbb.h

Interface exclusive to TBB.
